meaning_str.bing:
n. 家庭作业；功课
网络. 课外作业；布置作业；回家作业

课外作业；布置作业；回家作业

（学生的）家庭作业；课后作业；作业；预备工作；事先准备

sogou-CET6.n: 作业[出现20次)];准备工作[出现0次)]

1.en: Homework : Write a story about a picture shown in class and be ready to share next week.
1.cn: 家庭作业：关于在课堂上展示的图片写一个故事，并准备好在下周与同学们分享。

2.en: Whenever my kids had trouble juggling school, sports, social life and homework, I thought about sending them to bed earlier as a .
2.cn: 不管什么时候，当我的孩子遭遇学校、运动、社交生活和家庭作业等方面的问题时，我很少会想到让他们早点上床睡觉也是解决问题的一条途径。

3.en: Wheather it is going to bed on time, or finish your homework, think before you start complaining.
3.cn: 不管是按时上床睡觉，还是完成作业，抱怨之前先思考。

0.cn: 就这个了，我愿意为没有家庭作业而战。

1.en: What is it? The Odyssey, by Homer. It's my homework.
1.cn: 是什么书？《奥德赛》，荷马写的。我的家庭作业。

2.en: I have nobody at home who helps me with my homework.
2.cn: 我家里没有任何人可以指导我的家庭作业。

3.en: Well, she said that you weren't turning in your homework assignments.
3.cn: 好吧，她说你没有交你的家庭作业。

4.en: Oh, yay! Your homework. The one thing I was able to completely control.
4.cn: 噢，是的。你的家庭作业，我能够完全控制的一件事。

5.en: She don't like me, my father teaches soup, and I can't even help my own brother with his homework.
5.cn: 她不喜欢我，我爸爸教了汤，我甚至不能帮我弟弟完成他的家庭作业。

6.en: Okay. But you know, as a student of psychology who got a check-plus on her first homework assignment.
6.cn: 好吧，听你的，但你知道作为一个学习心理学的学生，在她的第一份家庭作业上得了一个A。

7.en: Hey, why do you always make me do your homework for you? Are you my bully? "Don't take away my lunch money, Bully McGee!" Okay.
7.cn: 嘿，为什么你总是让我帮你做家庭作业？你在欺凌我吗？“不要把我的午饭钱拿走，霸道麦吉！”好吧。

8.en: To South Carolina? When I want a job, I do my homework.
8.cn: 跑到南卡罗莱纳？应聘就得做好准备工作。

9.en: Well, why do, you know, go in that room and do your homework?

10.en: You know, when Sheldon gives you homework, you don't have to do it.
10.cn: 谢尔顿让你做事，你可以拒绝。

11.en: So, why is she leaving? Is it a school night and she has a lot of homework to do?
11.cn: 她为什么要走？刚放学功课一大堆？

12.en: Who am I, dad? You're just like me. Yeah? Would you do this? No homework, more freedom.
12.cn: 我是什么样的，爸爸？你就跟我一样。是吗？你会这样做吗？没有作业，更多自由。

13.en: He gets our days. Let's take back our nights. No homework, more freedom. Who's with me?
13.cn: 他占据了我们的白天时间，我们争取回夜晚的时间吧。没有作业，更多自由，谁赞同我？

14.en: Are you a nerd? No. Why would you ask me that? It's Friday night, and you're doing homework.
14.cn: 你是个书呆吗？不是，你为什么这么问我？现在是周五晚上，你却在做作业。

15.en: And you can go back to Twickenham and listen to the Home Service and do your Latin homework.
15.cn: 你可以回维克汉姆听你爸妈的唠叨做你的拉丁文作业。

16.en: You ever been to Germany? No. Oh, you'll love it. I can't go to Germany! Why? I got homework.
16.cn: 去过德国吗？没有。你会喜欢那里的。 我不能去德国。为什么？我还有作业呢。

17.en: They start by asking you to do their homework. But before you know it, the wolf pounces and you end up dinner.
17.cn: 他们从叫你帮他们写作业开始。然后在你反应过来之前，他们突袭你。接着你就成了盘中餐。

18.en: Dear Valentine. So this is Battle School. Every day, hours of training. And far more homework than we ever had on Earth.
18.cn: 亲爱的华伦蒂，战斗学校的生活开始了，每天都有数小时训练，还有比从前在地球上多得多的作业。

19.en: And you want to know why she doesn't kiss you on the forehead and give you a gold star on your homework at the end of the day.
19.cn: 你还抱怨她为什么不亲吻你的额头，每天给你的作业批个金色五角星。
